comment.text: The translation key "OAuthFilesReadDescription" is used to display the phrase "View all files and folders", appearing in UI elements related to file permissions or access controls. This text likely appears on a button or dropdown menu within a file management interface. Translators should focus on providing a clear and concise message that reflects this intended use case.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Прегледайте всички файлове и папки' is a good start but could be more accurately translated as 'Преглед на всички файлове и папки' or 'Вижте всички файлове и папки'. 'Прегледайте' implies a more thorough review than simply viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Преглед на всички файлове и папки

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Visualizza e gestisci tutti i file e le cartelle' implies the ability to manage files and folders, which is not conveyed by the English 'View all files and folders'.  'Gestisci' (manage) is an action not present in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Visualizza tutti i file e le cartelle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation "すべてのファイルとフォルダ" is too literal and doesn't convey the meaning of 'View all files and folders' accurately. It simply lists the objects without indicating the action of viewing them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "ファイルとフォルダの閲覧" (Fairu to Fōrudā no Bōkyū) which translates to 'Viewing files and folders' or "ファイルとフォルダを表示" (Fairu to Fōrudā o Hyōji) which translates to 'Display files and folders'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເບິ່ງເອກະສານ ແລະ ໂຟນເດີທັງໝົດ" translates to 'View documents and all folders'. While functionally similar, 'files' is more accurate than 'documents' in this context. 'files' specifically refers to digital files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເບິ່ງເອກະສານ ແລະ ໂຟນເດີທັງໝົດ could be improved to 'ເບິ່ງໄຟລ໌ ແລະ ໂຟນເດີທັງໝົດ' to more accurately translate 'files'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Skatīt visus failus un mapes" does not accurately convey the meaning of "View all files and folders." 'Mapes' translates to 'folders' but isn't as direct and natural as a better alternative.

The translation 'Vizualizarea fișierelor și folderelor' is a literal translation of 'Viewing files and folders.' The English phrase 'View all files and folders' implies a broader permission, not just viewing. A more accurate translation would convey the ability to see all files and folders, potentially including access.
The word 'ෆෝල්ඩර' is a transliteration and while understandable, a more common and accepted term in Sinhala for 'folder' could improve clarity and professionalism.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ෆෝල්ඩර් (using the English word transliterated with Sinhala letters) or  විභාගයක් (vibhaagayak) which means 'section' or 'division', depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Poglej vse datoteke in mape' translates more literally to 'Look at all files and folders'. The original English 'View all files and folders' implies a broader permission or access, not just viewing. A better translation would reflect that.

The Serbian translation 'Прикажи све фајлове и фасцикле' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'View all files and folders.' 'Прикажи' implies 'display' or 'show,' which isn't quite the same as 'view.' A more accurate translation would convey access or ability to see.
The word 'фасцикле' (fascikle) is used. While acceptable, 'foldere' (фолдери) would be more common in a technical context, reflecting the English terminology.
The word 'fascikle' is a less common and potentially archaic term for 'folders'.
